name: Help The Dog (Mikuson)
description:
When a monster takes your dog's favourite toy, in order to get it back you have to defeat King Megadog's army. You take the challenge - you fight monsters together with your dog using his special abilities.

Controls:

  • A, D - Move left and right
  • Escape - Pause the game
  • E - First dog's ability (it's shown in the game)
  • F - Second dog's ability (also shown in the game)

Thank you for checking out this game!

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2
